56462.<voice 00200_00056462><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00200_00056462><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>Wow! That's beautiful! So this is Hope
Hill.<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56463.<voice 00400_00056463><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00400_00056463><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>Thanks <pc>. You've helped me
get this far!<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56464.<voice 00440_00056464><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00440_00056464><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>Huh? That guy.<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56465.<voice 00730_00056465><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00730_00056465><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>Um. You are the next grand priest, Mr.
Zodera, right?<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56467.<voice 00882_00056467><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00882_00056467><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>Excuse me...! It's Mr. Zodera, isn't
it!<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56468.<voice 00962_00056468><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00962_00056468><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>Yes, it is.<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56469.<voice 01007_00056469><start_lip_sync n0:
Nice to meet you! I am dancer Liddy of the Gizant troupe. I will be dancing at the investiture ceremony of the
Grand Priest.

56470.<voice 01182_00056470><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01182_00056470><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>How did you become a dancer?<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56471.<voice 01222_00056471><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01222_00056471><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>Let's see. When I was a little kid, I
saw a performance by the Sitar troupe.
It was really interesting!<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56472.<voice 01402_00056472><start_lip_sync n0:
Among them, Janna, a dancer, danced so beautifully that I was attracted to her. So I decided to join the Sitar
troupe.

56473.<voice 01457_00056473><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01457_00056473><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>When I joined the troupe, Janna had
already quit, and the chairman had
been replaced by the current Gizant.<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56474.<voice 01497_00056474><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01497_00056474><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>But that's okay. I'm happy as long as
Zodera and all the customers enjoy the
show!<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56475.<voice 01592_00056475><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01592_00056475><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>No matter what kind of dances or
tricks they show me, I cannot enjoy
them.<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56477.<voice 01672_00056477><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01672_00056477><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>Especially for a dancer like you. I'm
going back to Alltrades Abbey.<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56478.<voice 01952_00056478><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01952_00056478><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>What was that? Did you just say that I
can't entertain everyone when I'm new?<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56479.<voice 02014_00056479><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02014_00056479><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>I heard he was an unsociable person,
but you didn't have to say anything
like that!<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56480.<voice 02110_00056480><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02110_00056480><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>It's okay. Go ahead and watch! I'll
make her say she had a great time!<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56481.<voice 02175_00056481><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02175_00056481><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>Oh, hey, heads up. I almost forgot
what I came here for. I'll have to
make a wish on Wish Flower.<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56483.<voice 02750_00056483><start_lip_sync n0:
If I bring this vase back home and it doesn't wither and flowers open properly, my dream will come true, he
said.

56484.<voice 02787_00056484><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02787_00056484><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>Are you curious about my wish? But
it's a secret. Hmmm.<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56485.<voice 02849_00056485><start_lip_sync n0:
Well, now that we've done what we had to do, let's go back to Allmighty Alltrades. I'll thank you for your
help, but you'll have to come see me later.

56486.<voice 00120_00056486><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00120_00056486><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>Ah <pc>. I've been waiting
for you to come back.<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56487.<voice 00230_00056487><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00230_00056487><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>Thanks for taking me up the hill.
Here, take it. It's my way of saying
thank you!<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56488.<voice 00330_00056488><start_lip_sync n0:
Come to think of it, why was Mr. Zodera at Wish Flower Hill? You don't look like the kind of person who makes
wishes.

56489.<voice 00370_00056489><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00370_00056489><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>Hey Liddy, what are you doing over
there?<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56490.<voice 00460_00056490><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00460_00056490><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>Oh, Gizant, the chairperson. I met Mr.
Zodera at the hill where the Wish
Flower blooms, but he's terrible!<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56491.<voice 00500_00056491><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00500_00056491><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>He told me it was impossible for a
dancer like you to entertain everyone!
I'm so angry just thinking about it!<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56492.<voice 00540_00056492><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00540_00056492><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>Yeah, okay, okay. You want to give
Zodera a big fat "ah-ha"? Then you
need to rehearse properly!<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56493.<voice 00580_00056493><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00580_00056493><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>You're the chairperson. You know what
you're doing. Well then, <pc>
I'm going back to Keiko!<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56494.<voice 00800_00056494><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00800_00056494><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>Zodera on Wish Flower Hill? I guess
you still can't forget.<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56495.<voice 00855_00056495><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00855_00056495><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>I saw you at the Town of Celed. You
saw me talking to Zodera back there,
didn't you?<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56496.<voice 00917_00056496><start_lip_sync n0:
I'm going to tell you something, because there's no point in hiding it. His real name is Sitar, and he was the
leader of this troupe before me.

56497.<voice 00947_00056497><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00947_00056497><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>I was on my way here after a show at
Gran Zedora. Janna, the dancer who was
the star of the troupe, died.<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56498.<voice 00987_00056498><start_lip_sync n0:
Janna went for the Wish Flower and was attacked by a monster, but Chairman Sitar felt it was his fault and quit
the troupe.

56499.<voice 01049_00056499><start_lip_sync n0:
Then I heard that the chairperson had become a priest. I was so surprised when I heard that he was a candidate
for the next great priest.

56500.<voice 01079_00056500><start_lip_sync n0:
To be honest, I'm not the chairman of the Utsuwa, so I've asked him several times to come back to the tavern and
join the troupe, but he's always refused.

56501.<voice 01119_00056501><start_lip_sync n0:
Liddy might be too nervous to dance if he knew that Zodera was the leader of the Sitar troupe he longed to be a
part of.

56502.<voice 01149_00056502><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01149_00056502><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>He's got talent. I think he can
surpass even Janna. That's why I want
to make this show a success.<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56503.<voice 01189_00056503><start_lip_sync n0:
Listen, don't reveal Zodera's true identity. Not just to Liddy, but to everyone at the temple. I don't want
to cause a scene here and now.
